title: Removal of conservator
context: ยง353-26 Removal of conservator. The conservator may be removed, and another conservator appointed in the former conservator&rsquo;s place, whenever the judge thinks there is just cause for removal. [L 1987, c 338, pt of ยง3; am L 2004, c 161, ยง13; am L 2005, c 22, ยง22]
